message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You wanted 50/50, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Take it or leave it!
You gave me a 30% cut last time, I'll give you a 42% cut this time. Take it!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. I'll give you a tiny piece of the pie, but it's the last offer I'll make.
